Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory
public class FacultyDirectory extends Object
Faculty directory object which stores all the faculty and manages them as a group this allows for the control of the current list of faculty.
Author:
albressl

    FacultyDirectory()
    This method constructs a new faculty directory

      This method initializes a new faculty directory for use by clearing the current directory

    • loadFacultyFromFile

      public void loadFacultyFromFile(String fileName)
      This method attempts to read faculty records from a given file and set the results as the current directory
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file being read
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be read

    • addFaculty

      public boolean addFaculty(String firstName, String lastName, String id, String email, String password, String repeatPassword, int maxCourses)
      This method creates a new faculty member and then attempts to add them to the list of faculty
      Parameters:
      firstName - First name of faculty member
      lastName - Last name of faculty member
      id - Id of faculty member
      email - email of faculty member
      password - password of faculty member
      repeatPassword - password of faculty member repeated
      maxCourses - the max number of courses the faculty member can teach
      Returns:
      boolean false if faculty member cannot be added

    • removeFaculty

      public boolean removeFaculty(String facultyId)
      This method removes a faculty member from the directory based on matching IDs
      Parameters:
      facultyId - the ID of the faculty member being removed
      Returns:
      boolean true if successfully removed

    • getFacultyDirectory

      public String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
      This method creates a 2d string array for use by the GUI that represents the faculty directory
      Returns:
      String[][] the faculty directory as a 2d string array

    • saveFacultyDirectory

      public void saveFacultyDirectory(String fileName)
      This saves the current faculty directory to a file for future use
      Parameters:
      fileName - the file being saved to
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if unable to save to file

    • getFacultyById

      public Faculty getFacultyById(String id)
      This method returns a specific faculty member and searched for them using their ID returns null if the faculty member cannot be found
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the desired faculty member
      Returns:
      the faculty member that was found
